attributes.title: Horrible!😡
attributes.review: Me and my child downloaded this app and not only did it make my child have to go to therapy but it also ruined her. As a mother I feel like this is a horrible app and should be deleted my poor baby is SUFFERING!😡 all of the people here who are also parents and other citizens would also agree I’m not alone.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: I really wanted this app to show my support for our beloved Cheeto but however when I got the app it slowed down my phone so much I had to stop using it. It drained my battery so low I couldn’t use my phone without the charger every few minutes this app is a inconvenience and I will not be supporting it anymore 😿😿😿😿😿😿

attributes.title: Inappropriate ads
attributes.review: I downloaded this app bc I thought it was gonna be about our Lord and Savior, Donald Trump. But I just kept getting ads about controlling women’s bodies, deporting Immigrants, and disenfranchising protesters. This is not what I signed up for, Mr. Trump. Why would you allow such heinous ads on your app... as I’m typing this, I just realized that these are your political views. How disgusting. ONE STAR!!!!👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

attributes.title: smh
attributes.review: I HATE THIS IS APP ITS SO GLITCHY. while i was yelling at how bad this app is my cat got on fire and started giving birth. GREAT. NOW I HAVE TO PAY FOR HIS FUNERAL AND CHILD SUPPORT. My step brother saw my cat was an undercover cop when it was burning alive and then PROCEEDED to stomp on him and keep his body as a present for grandma. THIS APP GAVE ME STDS THE DAY LATER WHEN I WOKE UP. once we gave my grandma her present she sacrificed the present to the 🍊 gods to cure trumps orange sickness. I WILL NEVER FORGET HOW BAD THAT WEEK WAS.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE. DON’T DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: This app was absolutely horrendous. It took days to download and i was so confused as to why. apparently it’s because it just is t made for iPhones. after it finally downloaded, it boarded insane music and ruined my ears. it also somehow brought witches out and i saw some around my neighborhood singing the horrid song that cake from the app. DO NOT USE.

I wish I could give this 0 stars. This app resettled all my alarms to random times. Every day I live in fear every day because if this. It’s corrupted my phone. I can’t change anything on my phone, contacts, brightness, sound, etc. It even set my lock screen and wallpaper to pictures of Donald Trump and Mike Pence in bed together.

attributes.title: WOST APP EVER!!😤🤮👹
attributes.review:
This is the WOST THING EVER! This app shouldn't even be here! Trump I mean this Cheeto is the worst president ever, he took my best friend from me just cus she isn't from America. So listen here Cheeto America isn't yours, immigrants build this so why are u kicking them out? This app is trash  its worst then fortnite and one of those hair games mixed together. Also i hate u💖 
                                                           - love gen-z

attributes.title: It is so terrible absolutely horrible. 😭
attributes.review: This app is terrible it has so many ads and it does not make any sense. I had to wait for 5 hours for it to download and when it did I started to have a panic attack because this orange donkey popped onto my screen. This app shouldn’t even be in the App Store!!! I will have nightmares forever!

attributes.title: T for ✨T R A S H ✨
attributes.review: If I could give 0 stars I would. I downloaded this app expecting it to be a Cheeto simulator where I have to run around as a bag of chips before people catch and eat me but I was highly disappointed with the outcome. For starters the app takes WAYYY to long to download and the overall aesthetic of it is pretty ugly. I will be contacting your managers for this.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
attributes.review: This might be the worst app I ever downloaded. Right when I opened it it started glitching and I thought it was just my wifi or data but when I used another the SAME thing happened. It’s so confusing to navigate and the graphics and layout are AWFUL. Save yourself some time and effort and just don’t get this app.
